descriptionHtml:
My first mod =P
Aim the spell at the floor. It will use this as a focal point, and then it will start raining for a couple seconds.
There is a sound version, and no sound version if you think it is too annoying.
I think further development will be done on the no sound version unless someone specifically asks otherwise

*Don't use this spell too many times in a row, spawning items, especially of this large quantity, can cause great stress/instability.
*I've set the septims to disappear after 10-20 seconds, so you should be fine.


*This mod is open to suggestions, if you have any ideas on more fun ways to 'make it rain' then please let me know
Plans for continuation:
   -more complex septim delivery systems (maybe add it to a staff or arrow effect?)
   -any suggestions you guys have I would be glad to attempt to implement

Location
========
1. console ~
2. for the arrow: help Moneymaker arrow
    for the spell: help Cash 
3. additem on the item ID

Install
=======
1. Copy the files to (install folder)\Skyrim\Data\

Uninstall
=========
1. If you've casted the spell recently, wait a couple seconds for the gold to all disppear (max 20 seconds)
2. Delete these files 
-Data\rainy.esp
-Data\scripts\_PlaceRainSPELL.pex
-Data\meshes\markerx.nif

Changelog
=========
-4/7/2015 : Added the arrow version of the spell: Moneymaker arrow
-4/7/2015 : Increased gold drop duration. septims dropped increased from 30->50
-4/6/2015 : 1.0 Release
author: alslacki
